title: Oru Paarvaiyil Poo Lyrics Siva Manasula Sakthi
stanzas: <div dir="ltr" style="text-align: left;" trbidi="on">Oru Paarvaiyil Poo Lyrics Siva Manasula Sakthi

Oru paarvaiyil poo koduthaai
oru varthaiyil vazha vaithaai
oru megathai pol enthan
dhegathai maatri vaithaai

iragai pol oru vegathil vegathil
vaanathil vaanathil selluginren
nilavai pol unai thoorathil
thoorathil parkindra podhellaam
thullukindren

nee enadhu uyiraaga
naan unadhu uyiraaga
or uravu nenjathil
thondridum neram

nee kaanum kanavellaam
naan kaanum kanavaagi
naam serndhu ondraaga
paarthida vendum

muzhuthaai adi unnaale
ullukkul ennennavo aagum
category: Song:Oru Paarvaiyil Poo - Siva Manasula Sakthi

seo.title: Oru Paarvaiyil Poo Lyrics Siva Manasula Sakthi
seo.description: Oru Paarvaiyil Poo Lyrics Siva Manasula Sakthi - Tamil song lyrics from Siva Manasula Sakthi
